負.definition: to bear; to carry (on one's back); to turn one's back on; to be defeated; negative (math. etc)

負一屏.definition: left panel (displayed by swiping right from the main panel of the home screen)

負債.definition: to be in debt; to incur debts; liability (finance)

負傷.definition: to be wounded; to sustain an injury

負優化.definition: to degrade the performance of a sold product via a system update

負分.definition: negative score; minus (in grades, such as A-)

負外部性.definition: negative influence, effect that people's doings or behavior have on others (society)

負心.definition: ungrateful; heartless; to fail to be loyal to one's love

負心漢.definition: traitor to one's love; heartless rat

負擔.definition: to bear (an expense, a responsibility etc); burden

負擔不起.definition: cannot afford; cannot bear the burden

負有責任.definition: at fault; blamed for; responsible (for a blunder or crime)

負疚.definition: (literary) to feel apologetic; to feel guilty

負笈.definition: (literary) to leave home to pursue studies in (a distant place)

負翁.definition: debtor (jocular term, homonymous with 富翁[fu4 weng1])

負荊請罪.definition: lit. to bring a bramble and ask for punishment (idiom); fig. to offer sb a humble apology

負責.definition: to be responsible for; to be in charge of; to bear responsibility for; conscientious

負責任.definition: to take responsibility; to bear responsibility; to be responsible

負重.definition: (lit. and fig.) to carry a heavy load; to carry a heavy burden

負隅頑抗.definition: (idiom) to put up fierce resistance despite being surrounded; to stubbornly refuse to admit defeat
